Gateway Connectivity

Our gateways enable fast IoT integration out-of-the-box and serve as intelligent intermediaries between all sensors in the field and the cloud. Sensors can either be connected via a serial interface or communicate via LoRaWAN with the gateway

Ethernet Gateway

For extremely reliable applications with high security guidelines for indoor use

  • High reliability
  • High security
  • Wired

WiFi Gateway

For applications that require high flexibility or that are used in places where a wired solution is not possible

  • High flexibility
  • Wireless

Cellular Gateway

For applications that require high flexibility and are located in outdoor areas. Thanks to the LPWAN standard NB-IoT, the gateway is extremely energy efficient despite its long range

  • High flexibility
  • Low power
  • Energy-efficient
  • Wireless
